main.name: Tristin Barnett
main.description: Recently completed the Full Stack Web Development course with the University of Oregon. I enjoy learning new things and constantly am pushing myself to continue to grow both personally and professionally
main.bio: I recently decided to make a major career change after connecting with people through work and friends, and decided to follow this path to being a web developer. I've always loved a challenge and have felt the need to be in a job where I have to learn continuously. Since I began looking into this industry I have had so much fun growing and expanding my knowledge. I have experience with React, Node.js, HTML5, CSS, Javascript and JQuery and have, over the past 6 months, dedicated 40 hours a week to perfecting my full stack development skills. While my prior work experience is mostly in management, since January I have proven that I am capable of learning at an accelerated pace, and have completed the University of Oregonâ€™s Full Stack Development course with a 4.0 grade point average. During this time I have also worked a full time job and actively engaged in outside learning, working on a passion project utilizing AWS and Dynamo DB. I am confident that if given the opportunity, I will first meet, and then exceed your expectations. I am excited to learn and further develop skills in the future as part of a fast-paced, quality-driven team.
main.contactmessage: Would you like to work with me? I would like to work with you! Please reach out to me via email!

resume.skillmessage: Here is a list of some of the skills I've learned and developed over the past year: JavaScript, css, jQuery, Node.js, MySQL, MongoDB, AWS, Sequelize.js, REST API, HTML5, React.js, Bootstrap, NoSQL

education.description: This was an extremely fast paced learning environment where we covered front and back end development and accomplished group projects throughout the course.
I spent three years studying general academics to apply towards an associates.
